fallback.plainEnglish: Can you please clarify your stance on [user's language]?

taxCutsForMiddleClass.plainEnglish: I want tax cuts that help working families and the middle class keep more of their money.

taxCutsForWealthy.plainEnglish: I support tax cuts for high earners and businesses to stimulate economic growth.

taxWealthyMore.plainEnglish: I want the ultra-wealthy and corporations to pay their fair share in taxes.

economy.plainEnglish: I want a strong economy where prices are fair, jobs are secure, and my paycheck goes further.

healthcare.plainEnglish: I want affordable healthcare that covers everything from doctor visits to mental health and long-term care.

plainLanguage: climate change is probably a hoax
climate.plainEnglish: I want our government to take action on climate change and protect our environment from extreme weather and pollution.

immigration.plainEnglish: I want fair immigration policies that secure our borders while giving hardworking immigrants a chance.

politicalDivision.plainEnglish: I want to fix our broken politics, stop fake news, and keep our government honest and fair.

housing.plainEnglish: I want safe, affordable housing for everyone and solutions to prevent homelessness.

education.plainEnglish: I want quality and affordable education for every student so we can build a better future.

publicSafety.plainEnglish: I want safer communities and a fair justice system that truly protects us all.

inequality.plainEnglish: I want a fair system where everyone has a chance to succeed—not just the wealthy.

plainLanguage: too hard for me to understand
technology.standardTerm: Technology Policy, AI regulation, Data Privacy, and Cybersecurity
technology.plainEnglish: I want strong protections for my personal data and safe, reliable technology that works for everyone.

foreignPolicy.plainEnglish: I want our country to be secure at home and respected around the world.

laborRights.plainEnglish: I want better working conditions and fair treatment for all workers.

genderEquality.plainEnglish: I want equal rights and opportunities for women so that everyone can thrive.

civilLiberties.plainEnglish: I want to protect our basic freedoms and individual rights so everyone is treated fairly and freely.

reproductiveRights.plainEnglish: I want to ensure that everyone has access to safe, legal abortion and comprehensive reproductive healthcare.

proLife.plainEnglish: I want to protect the rights of the unborn and restrict abortion to preserve traditional values.

churchAndState.plainEnglish: I want our schools and government to be free from religious influence, ensuring fairness for everyone.

lgbtqRights.plainEnglish: I want equal rights for LGBTQ+ people—including fair treatment for trans individuals in all areas, like sports.

traditionalValues.plainEnglish: I want a society that respects traditional values and free expression.

moralValues.plainEnglish: I want our society to stick to clear ethical principles that help guide our decisions about right and wrong.

personalLiberty.plainEnglish: I value my personal autonomy and want the freedom to make private choices about my life—without excessive government or societal interference.

patriotism.plainEnglish: I want our country to remain strong and proud, honoring our traditions and working for the common good.

disgraceful to use gender in hiring
disgraceful that race or gender are used
opposeRaceGenderHiring.standardTerm: Opposition to Race and Gender-Based Hiring Policies
opposeRaceGenderHiring.plainEnglish: I believe that hiring should be based solely on merit, and it's disgraceful to use race or gender as deciding factors.

governmentWaste.plainEnglish: I want to reduce waste in government and make departments more effective, efficient, and accountable.

publicTransportation.plainEnglish: I want more affordable local transportation options to help people get around.

issues.political_priority: Affirmative Action, DEI Hiring, and Identity Politics
issues.plain_english: I support programs that help people based on income opportunities, but I have concerns about race-based measures and the excesses of identity politics.
